thread.title: Laura Simms
thread.title_full: Bench Accounting reviewed by Laura Simms

author: Laura Simms
title: Laura Simms
text: My business finances got more complicated than I wanted to wrangle with on a monthly basis, and it has been a relief to hand my bookkeeping over to Bench. The service has been excellent and I appreciate that the same small team reviews my books every month, one line item at a time. As a small business owner, I feel better knowing that professionals are handling my books so I can spend more time growing my business instead monitoring nickels. I am also looking forward to tax time when my Bench reports are going to save me DAYS of work.
